text: Barkha Sonkar (24 December 1996) is an International basketball player. She is a member of India women's national basketball team and represented India in "2017 FIBA Women's Asia Cup Division B" ==Early life and education== She was selected for the IMG Reliance scholarship programmes in the US for schooling and training.http://archive.indianexpress.com/news/15yearold-barkha-an-asset- for-up-after-florida-stint/813815/ Studied high school at IMG Academy Bradenton, Florida, and graduated from IMG Academy in 2016, after that went to Hillsborough Community College, played for hawks (National Collegiate Athletic Association) for 2 years. Currently playing for Lindsey Wilson College, Kentucky ==Championship== During the 2017 FIBA Asia Cup held at Sree Kanteerava Stadium, Bengaluru, Barkha played well and India defeated Kazakhstan by 75-73. Barkha has been top 3rd player in the match. == External links == * ==References== Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Indian basketball players Category:Basketball players from Uttar Pradesh Category:Basketball players from Varanasi Category:Lindsey Wilson Blue Raiders athletes Category:Hillsborough Community College alumni Category:Husson Eagles Category:Indian expatriate basketball people Category:Indian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Expatriate basketball people in the United States
title: Barkha Sonkar
